pr_title: Push history when navigating to route-not-found view

timeline.message: Push history when navigating to route-not-found view

timeline.bodyText:
I would suggest combine (event instanceof ErrorNavigationEvent) && isRouterLink in  one if.
Less nested ifs.
timeline.author: denis-anisimov

replies.bodyText: Also the other conditions should not be tested at all if event is of type ErrorNavigationEvent. Simplified the if structure and extracted the logic to another method.
replies.author: joheriks

replies.bodyText: You can combine everything inside the method - java uses short-circuit evaluation if used with && or ||, meaning the right side won't be executed, when left already matched.
replies.author: knoobie

timeline.author: denis-anisimov

timeline.bodyText:
I think we require javadocs for protected methods.
I would avoid should  in method names. Not sure whether this is a better name though.
timeline.author: denis-anisimov

replies.bodyText: No need for protected as a matter of fact, made private. Also renamed.
replies.author: joheriks

timeline.message: Renamed method and changed to private
